subject: Stadiums and Arenas
Basketball
lead_paragraph: The Sonics left for Oklahoma City, but a San Francisco-based businessman who grew up in Seattle has plans for an arena that could entice the N.B.A. back to the city.
snippet: The Sonics left for Oklahoma City, but a San Francisco-based businessman who grew up in Seattle has plans for an arena that could entice the N.B.A. back to the city.
